title: Accidental gift
body: So I accidentally gifted a friend 50 dollars of rp whilst trying to purchase myself rp, how would i go about recovering this?

replies.body:
That will certainly be an interesting surprise for your friend, and I  hope you've had a chance to reach out to him about it!  The gifting center has you go through a confirmation before finalizing the purchase, meaning I can't guarantee that we can assist with this.  

Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can look into this and see what we can do.  We'll reply to your ticket as soon as we can!
Your 2nd option (after submitting a request as Porocles mentioned) would be to get your friend to gift you the content you want.
